TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT to_date(l.txt_key_value,'yyyy-mm-dd') TRAN_DT, decode(PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.COMP_CD,'011','2','014','4','SG','2','BN','4') COMP_CD, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.AGENCY_CD, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.AGENCY_NAME, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.CURR_DM_CD, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.CURR_DM_NAME, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.CURR_DM_STATUS, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.NEW_DM_CD, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.NEW_DM_NAME, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.EFF_DT, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.REMARK, to_date(l.txt_key_value,'yyyy-mm-dd') CYCLE_DT, sysdate CREATE_DT, 'INFA' CREATE_BY, last_day(to_date(l.txt_key_value,'yyyy-mm-dd')) CYCLE_MTH, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.ERROR_MSG, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.ASSG_DM_PROCESS, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.USR_CREATE_BY, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.USR_CREATE_DATE, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.USR_UPD_BY, PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.USR_UPD_DATE FROM PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP,in_etl_control l WHERE PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP.TXT_GROUP in (SELECT MAX(TXT_GROUP) FROM PER_PARIS_ASSIGN_TEMP)
and l.txt_file_name='GLOBAL' and l.txt_key_string='OPER_CYCLE_DATE'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
